Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.observation

Class UserInterfaceObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.Observable<UserInterfaceObserver>
      • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.UserInterfaceObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Board, Cli, Menu
    public class UserInterfaceObservable
extends Observable<UserInterfaceObserver>
    Observable class for the interaction between the User Interfaces and the ClientView
